Plot: Every year again a family is celebrating Christmas. And every year it ends in a catastrophe.
Title: Alle Jahre wieder
Writer: Matthias Schmidt (creator), Gregor Eisenbeiss (creator), Matthias Schmidt (screenplay), Gregor Eisenbeiss (screenplay), Marius Janz (screenplay)
Actors: Frank Voß, Tina Eschmann, Caroline Kiesewetter, Carl Heinz Choynski
